mapper.select: select t1.room_id AS roomId, t1.user_id AS userId, t1.role, t2.nick_name AS nickName, t2.thumb_icon_url AS thumbIconUrl, t2.sex, t3.`level` from tb_voice_room_role t1 LEFT JOIN tb_user t2 on t1.user_id=t2.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_user_account_attach t3 on t1.user_id=t3.user_id where t1.room_id = #{roomId} and t1.role = #{role}
